Acceptance Criteria: Welcome page loads <1.5s. Comments/reviews display <2s. Search results <2s. Button responses <1s. Auto-save every 10s. Real-time updates for new requests.
Screen Definition: Fast response times for hospital operations
User Story: As a hospital manager, I want fast system responses for efficient hospital operations.

Acceptance Criteria: Support 200+ concurrent hospital staff. Database queries <500ms. Image uploads <7s (5MB). GPS updates every 10s. Memory <120MB mobile. Handle 100+ simultaneous bookings.
User Story: As a hospital administrator, I want the system to support multiple staff without performance degradation.

Acceptance Criteria: 99.8% uptime for hospital operations. Auto-backup every 1 hour. Failed notifications retry 3x. Network interruption recovery. Critical actions logged. Recovery time <5 minutes.
User Story: As a hospital manager, I want reliable system access so hospital operations aren't disrupted.

Acceptance Criteria: Bcrypt encryption for credentials. Patient data access logging with hospital ID. HTTPS/TLS 1.3. 8-hour session expiry. 3 failed login limit. MFA for admin functions.
Screen Definition: Protect patient information and hospital records
User Story: As a hospital manager, I want complete security for patient and hospital information.

Acceptance Criteria: Role-based access by department and position. Authorization validation for all actions. Admin approval for doctor listings. Audit trails for compliance. API credential validation.
User Story: As a hospital administrator, I want controlled access ensuring staff perform only authorized actions.

Acceptance Criteria: Healthcare privacy compliance (HIPAA). Encrypted hospital data at rest. 7-year record retention. Data anonymization for analytics. Secure account deletion. Medical-grade integrations.
User Story: As a compliance officer, I want the hospital platform to meet all healthcare data protection requirements.

Acceptance Criteria: Desktop/tablet-optimized interface. 44px touch targets. High contrast for medical environments. 14-22px scalable text. Voice commands for hands-free operation. Multi-monitor support.
User Story: As hospital staff, I want an interface designed for hospital environments for efficient operations.

Acceptance Criteria: Critical actions in 2 clicks. Patient/resource info accessible <3s. Clear hospital context in errors. Hospital management design standards. Emergency info prominence. Minimal workflow interruptions.
User Story: As hospital staff, I want streamlined workflows that don't interfere with patient care operations.

Acceptance Criteria: 80% test coverage. 3-version backward compatibility. API versioning support. Hospital compliance logging. Off-hours maintenance scheduling. Hospital workflow documentation.
User Story: As hospital IT team, I want maintainable code ensuring continuous hospital operations.

Acceptance Criteria: Real-time hospital performance monitoring. 3-minute issue alerts. Off-peak update deployment. Daily backup verification. Staff feedback tracking. 10-minute rollback capability.
User Story: As hospital operations manager, I want automated monitoring ensuring platform availability.

Acceptance Criteria: Support 500+ hospitals in network. 10,000+ patient records/hospital. 500+ simultaneous resource bookings. High-traffic hospital content. 20,000+ daily notifications. Multi-region deployment.
User Story: As healthcare network administrator, I want scalable infrastructure supporting growing hospital operations.

Acceptance Criteria: Configurable hospital departments. Plug-and-play medical equipment integrations. Multi-language hospital interface. Custom hospital forms. Standardized medical device APIs. Scalable telemedicine integration.
User Story: As hospital software architect, I want extensible features adapting to different hospital types and specializations.
